FuncDef:
The datasize command sets the size of the data field in an NQA test packet of ICMP Ping test type.
The undo datasize command restores the default data field size. The datasize command sets the size of the data field in an NQA test packet of ICMP Ping test type. The undo datasize command restores the default data field size. By default, the size of the data field in an NQA test packet is 0 bytes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the size of the data field in an NQA test packet.
The value ranges from 0 to 8100, in bytes.

ExtraInfo: The datasize command sets the size of the data field in a test packet. This ensures that the size of the test packet is closer to the size of the actual data packet and the statistics obtained is more accurate.
